item.title: Not Even Elon Musk’s Money Can Buy A Kid The Benefits Of Married Parents
item.description: The biggest loser in Elon Musk’s baby mama drama is the kid whose parents think money can buy the benefits of having kids within marriage.

item.title: Detroit-Area Clerk Blows Whistle On ‘Years’ Of Ballot Trafficking, While AG Meets With Alleged Fraudster
item.description: The Hamtramck clerk alleged pervasive ballot trafficking in the city's elections. Meanwhile, Michigan's AG met with a fraud suspect.

item.title: Abortion Pill Reversal Saved My Son’s Life. A Pro-Life Community Saved Mine
item.description: About seven months after reversing my chemical abortion, my son arrived. I love him more than I ever feared having him.

item.title: New GOP Legislation Would Combat CCP’s Secret Police In The U.S.
item.description: Passing this legislation is crucial for safeguarding U.S. sovereignty and countering the Chinese Communist Party's encroachment and influence efforts.

item.title: Why The NFL Shouldn’t Ban The ‘Brotherly Shove’
item.description: If the Packers or other teams have problems with the 'brotherly shove,' they have a simple solution: develop and execute a defensive strategy to stop ...
